Subcategory: Anaesthetists, Euthanasia, Miscellaneous, Operating Theatre, Prosthesis or Wheelchair, Surgery, Ultrasound & Lab Tests, X-rays
Notes:
Cover the following expenses incurred in a licensed vet
clinic for illness or injury:

Cover expenses incurred in a licensed vet clinic for a
confinement of no less than 12 consecutive hours for
illness or injury

Cover expenses of consultation and prescribed drugs
(excluding drugs related to a above), dressings and
injections dispensed by a licensed vet clinic for illness
or injury

Cover expenses of vet-recommended chemotherapy
treatment incurred in a licensed vet clinic

Cover any reasonable and necessary expenses for prescribed drugs, training under training centres if the insured pet is diagnosed with mental or emotional disorder by a vet as a
direct result of injury; Maximum benefit limit per visit per day 500
